body_html:
Hi there - I'm trying to test the demo app as well. One thing I noticed is that only 4 cores of my 8-core phone were used, even if I changed the number of threads by ProtoConfig. I also modified the function NumSchedulableCPUs in port.cc to set kDefaultCores to 8.
Any advice?
body_text:

body:
Hi there - I'm trying to test the demo app as well. One thing I noticed is that only 4 cores of my 8-core phone were used, even if I changed the number of threads by ProtoConfig. I also modified the function NumSchedulableCPUs in port.cc to set kDefaultCores to 8.
Any advice?
